shapes

Class Circular

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Shape
      • shapes.Circular
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Shape>

    public class Circular
extends Shape
    A object class for any shape that has a circular base. Extends the Shape class.
    Version:
    1.0 Created on February 20, 2020
    Author:
    Casey Majandog
